Class PreProcess

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.commands.PreProcess
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.chain.Command
public class PreProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.chain.Command

The first module in the toolkit that transforms the SCPM into a XML structur to be used by the rest of the toolkit modules.
